secTitle: We Have Fantustic Team To Help Student And They Are Always Ready.

dataList.dec: I have been placed with ICICI Bank, one of the top private sector banks in the country. I always dreamed of working in banks or financial sectors and Shoolini has made my dreams come true.

The first step of my journey to success started with Shoolini University and has reached ICICI now. Thanks to campus placement that continued in the online mode in the present uncertain scenario, I got hired by one of the top banking companies.

The day I got selected with Hindustan Unilever Limited was the happiest day of my life. I can't thank Shoolini University enough to bring in such a big company and to provide us with such a great opportunity.
I entered the gates of Shoolini as a timid young girl and now Shoolini has transformed me into a confident professional.This has helped me to make my place in SCCNL.
